short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to view the layout of a webpage for different devices.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Layout Viewer is a chrome extension that helps frontend developer to view their web pages in different devices and orientation. The idea is inspired by the Chrome only where developers can view the responsiveness of the their web pages by using the developer tool and selecting the different devices. On enabling the Layout Viewer extension a button will be added to the right screen of the all the chrome web pages. On clicking the button a small screen will appear which will open the current open tab UI in the provided iframe inside the extension and having options to choose different devices and orientation. Developers can also add one or more screens of the same tab to choose devices range. 

It is built to just help frontend developers to make their web pages more responsive with easiness. It does not store or process any data related with the current opening web page.
